meanings.definition: The quality or state of being desirable.
meanings.sent1: The desirableness of the new toy made all the kids want it.
meanings.sent2: The desirableness of the beach vacation was evident in the smiles of the family.
meanings.sent3: The desirableness of the last piece of cake caused a playful tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: Her desirableness in the job market was like a shining star among applicants.
meanings.sent5: The desirableness of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: The attractiveness or appeal of something.
meanings.sent1: The desirableness of the shiny red sports car caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The desirableness of the cozy fireplace drew people in on a cold night.
meanings.sent3: The desirableness of the fluffy puppy was irresistible to the children.
meanings.sent4: The desirableness of the idea sparked a wave of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The desirableness of the garden filled the air with the scent of blooming flowers.
